title: Help! All my saved tab groups disappeared after restarting
content: I had so many instances of firefox and tabs that i decided i must organize them on tabgroups, i read they were secure enough and would be restored along with open tabs on new session. But after restarting all my "close and save" tab groups are missing! are they still saved? how can i recover them?
creator: felipealexandrepinto

title: How do I know which AI is responding and how do I return to same chat?
content: Using AI in Firefox. How do I know which option I am using and how to return to a particular chat and/or best save the chat?
creator: Rosanne.Woodroof
